message: Working meal plan with all fixes

primary.name: Greek Yogurt Parfait Bowl
primary.description: Layers of Greek yogurt with honey, nuts, and fresh berries
primary.why_perfect_for_goal: High in protein from Greek yogurt, essential for muscle repair and growth. The nuts provide healthy fats to support hormone production.

alternatives.why_perfect_for_goal: Plant-based protein from falafel supports muscle gain while providing complex carbohydrates for energy

extraRestaurantOptions.description: Scrambled eggs with spinach, tomatoes, and feta cheese
extraRestaurantOptions.why_perfect_for_goal: High-quality protein from eggs and calcium from feta support muscle development

primary.restaurant_description: Mediterranean restaurant with fresh, healthy options
primary.dish_description: House marinated organic beef kebab served over rice with vegetables
primary.why_perfect_for_goal: Rich in complete protein from organic beef, essential for muscle repair and growth. Rice provides energy for workouts.

alternatives.name: Chickpea and Spinach Salad Bowl
alternatives.description: Fresh spinach salad with chickpeas, quinoa, and tahini dressing
alternatives.why_perfect_for_goal: Plant-based protein from chickpeas and complete amino acids from quinoa support muscle synthesis

extraRestaurantOptions.description: Wild-caught ahi tuna marinated with ginger ponzu sauce over jasmine rice
extraRestaurantOptions.why_perfect_for_goal: High-quality lean protein from tuna with omega-3 fatty acids for muscle recovery

primary.name: Grilled Chicken and Veggie Skewers
primary.description: Marinated chicken breast skewers with bell peppers and zucchini, grilled to perfection
primary.why_perfect_for_goal: Lean protein from chicken breast is ideal for muscle building, while vegetables provide essential nutrients for recovery

alternatives.why_perfect_for_goal: Bresaola is a lean cured meat high in protein, while mozzarella provides calcium for muscle function

extraRestaurantOptions.description: Tender calamari braised in rich tomato sauce with herbs
extraRestaurantOptions.why_perfect_for_goal: Calamari provides lean protein and omega-3 fatty acids that support muscle recovery and reduce inflammation

primary.name: Protein Smoothie Bowl
primary.description: Thick protein smoothie base topped with granola, berries, and nuts
primary.why_perfect_for_goal: High protein content from protein powder kickstarts muscle protein synthesis for the day

alternatives.name: Avocado Toast with Poached Eggs
alternatives.description: Whole grain toast with mashed avocado topped with perfectly poached eggs
alternatives.why_perfect_for_goal: Complete protein from eggs and healthy fats from avocado provide sustained energy and muscle-building nutrients

extraRestaurantOptions.description: Quinoa bowl with feta, olives, tomatoes, and a soft-boiled egg
extraRestaurantOptions.why_perfect_for_goal: Complete protein from eggs and quinoa provides all essential amino acids for muscle growth

primary.restaurant_description: Healthy restaurant focusing on gluten-free, nutritious meals
primary.dish_description: Grass-fed beef with sweet potato, quinoa, and seasonal vegetables
primary.why_perfect_for_goal: Grass-fed beef provides high-quality protein and creatine for muscle building, while sweet potato offers complex carbohydrates

alternatives.name: Mediterranean Quinoa Power Bowl
alternatives.description: Quinoa with grilled vegetables, chickpeas, feta, and olive oil dressing
alternatives.why_perfect_for_goal: Complete protein from quinoa and chickpeas supports muscle protein synthesis

extraRestaurantOptions.description: Grilled salmon over arugula with lemon vinaigrette
extraRestaurantOptions.why_perfect_for_goal: Salmon provides complete protein and omega-3 fatty acids that reduce inflammation and support muscle recovery

primary.name: Turkey Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles
primary.description: Lean turkey meatballs served over spiralized zucchini with marinara sauce
primary.why_perfect_for_goal: Lean turkey provides high-quality protein while zucchini noodles keep the meal light but satisfying

alternatives.why_perfect_for_goal: Branzino is a lean fish high in protein and omega-3 fatty acids, perfect for muscle building and recovery

extraRestaurantOptions.description: Marinated grilled chicken with rice, vegetables, and tahini sauce
extraRestaurantOptions.why_perfect_for_goal: Lean chicken breast provides complete protein essential for muscle growth and repair
